name: Isaac Nesley
greetingText: Are you french revolution? Because im losing my head for you aha aha
wishText: Happy Valentine's Day, bb.Today and every day, I'm grateful for your presence in my life. Your love fills my heart with warmth and happiness, and I am endlessly grateful to have you as my partner.You are the greatest gift I could ever ask for. I love you more than words can express<3 mwahh
